item.title: Current Conditions : 29.4F, Overcast - 6:49 PM EST Feb. 9
item.description: Temperature: 29.4°F | Humidity: 71% | Pressure: 30.05in ( Falling) | Conditions: Overcast | Wind Direction: South | Wind Speed: 0.0mph

item.title: Sunday as of Feb. 9 4:00 PM EST
item.description: Sunday - Mostly cloudy. High of 32F. Winds less than 5 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

item.title: Sunday Night as of Feb. 9 4:00 PM EST
item.description: Sunday Night - Overcast with snow in the evening, then mostly cloudy with snow. Low of 23F. Winds less than 5 mph. Chance of snow 90% with accumulations up to 2 in. possible.

item.title: Monday as of Feb. 9 4:00 PM EST
item.description: Monday - Partly cloudy. High of 28F with a windchill as low as 14F. Winds from the NNW at 5 to 15 mph.
